net.proteusframework.core.script

Class ScriptContextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.script.ScriptContextImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptContext

    public class ScriptContextImpl
extends Object
implements ScriptContext
    A ScriptContext implementation designed to have additional scopes added.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
